title: Overview
content: This site is built using hugo with the Geekdoc submodule and hosted on GitHub

title: Charts Float Marketcap
content: General overview of charts, candlesticks, chart frequency(1hr,4hr,24hr,etc), what is a market cap, what is a float, beta, PE ratio, EPS, Dividend, volume

title: Psychology
content: the idea would be to talk about how psychology plays into trading. Simple things like red and green charts vs blue charts, misleading media outlets, FOMO, etc.

content: definition of bid, ask, spread, limit order, market order

content: introduction to automated trading platforms such as cryptohopper

title: How to Edit This Site Through a Web Browser
content:
To edit a page thorough a web browser, first navigate to the page that you would like to edit and then click the “Edit this page” button at the top right of the page.
   Edit Button   This will then bring you to the GitHub repo and you will be shown the file that contains the page you wish to edit. To edit the page, click the “Edit this file” button in the top right.
   Edit Button   Place your edits in the file as shown below. A guide for how to include pictures, equations, code blocks, columns, hints, etc. can be found at the Geekdocs Demo Site.
   Example of Editing a File   Once you have completed editing the file, click the “Commit” button at the bottom of the page.
   Commit Button

title: Recovering Removed or Deleted information
content:
There are many ways to access information on the internet when the original is removed.
archive.today
One way to do this is by using archive.today. They also provide an extension that works with Brave browser and it allows you to easily archive pages with the click of a button.
   archive.today   URL Tracking When Archiving
When archiving a website, watch out for tracking information in the URL. Tracking information starts with a ? and contains everything that follows (ex. www.reddit.com/mypost?utm_source=share). A link with tracking Information and a link without tracking information will be saved as two separate websites. More information on URL tracking can be found here.  Wayback Machine
Another source for archived websites is Wayback Machine.
   Wayback Machine   Wayback Machine Content Removal
It is possible for website owners to request content to be removed from Wayback Machine.  Reddit Information
To recover information that has been removed from Reddit, replace “reddit” in the URL with “removeddit”. Removeddit actively monitors reddit and archives posts and comments that are removed.
   Removeddit
